description.english: Collect 50 scrap in one day

description.spanish: Recoge 50 de chatarra en un día.

displayName.french: Le temps, c'est de la ferraille
displayName.japanese: タイム・イズ・スクラップ

description.english: Collect 100 scrap in one day

description.italian: Raccogli 100 rottami in un giorno

description.portuguese: Coletar 100 de sucata em um dia
description.schinese: 一天之内获得100个碎片
description.spanish: Recoge 100 de chatarra en un día.

description.english: Find an uncommon weapon
description.french: Trouvez une arme peu commune.
description.italian: Trova un'arma non comune
description.japanese: 珍しい武器を見つける
description.portuguese: Encontrar uma arma incomum
description.schinese: 获得一个罕见武器
description.spanish: Encuentra un arma poco común.

displayName.japanese: 素晴らしきエンジニアリング

description.english: Find a rare weapon
description.french: Trouvez une arme rare.
description.italian: Trova un'arma rara
description.japanese: レア武器を見つける
description.portuguese: Encontrar uma arma rara
description.schinese: 获得一个稀有武器
description.spanish: Encuentra un arma rara.

description.english: Find a legendary weapon
description.french: Trouvez une arme légendaire.
description.italian: Trova un'arma leggendaria
description.japanese: レジェンダリー武器を見つける
description.portuguese: Encontrar uma arma lendária
description.schinese: 获得一个史诗级武器
description.spanish: Encuentra un arma legendaria.

description.english: Buy something from the vending machine
description.french: Achetez quelque chose au distributeur.
description.italian: Compra qualcosa dal distributore automatico
description.japanese: 自動販売機から何か購入する
description.portuguese: Comprar algo na máquina de vendas
description.schinese: 从自动贩卖机里购买物品。
description.spanish: Compra algo en una máquina expendedora.

description.english: Use 3 different special powers in a day
description.french: Utilisez 3 pouvoirs spéciaux différents en un jour.
description.german: Benutze 3 verschiedene Spezialfähigkeiten an einem Tag
description.italian: Usa 3 diversi poteri speciali in un giorno
description.japanese: 1日に異なる特殊能力を3つ使用する
description.polish: Użyj 3 różnych mocy specjalnych w ciągu jednego dnia.
description.portuguese: Usar 3 poderes especiais diferentes em um dia
description.russian: Используйте 3 разных особых силы за день.
description.schinese: 一天之内触发3个不同特殊技能
description.spanish: Usa 3 poderes especiales diferentes en un solo día.

description.english: Search all houses on a mission
description.french: Fouillez toutes les maisons lors d'une mission.
description.german: Durchsuche alle Häuser auf einer Mission
description.italian: Perquisisci tutte le case in una missione
description.japanese: ミッション中にすべての家を探索する
description.koreana: 한 미션 안에 모든 집 탐색하기
description.portuguese: Vasculhar todas as casas em uma missão
description.schinese: 在单个任务内搜寻完所有的房屋
description.spanish: Inspecciona todas las casas de una misión.

description.english: Heal a survivor that is almost dead.
description.french: Soignez un survivant sur le point de mourir.
description.german: Heile eine Überlebenden der fast tot ist.
description.italian: Guarisci un sopravvissuto quasi morto.
description.japanese: 死にそうな生存者を回復する
description.polish: Ulecz ocalałego, który jest bliski śmierci.
description.portuguese: Cure um sobrevivente que está quase morto.
description.russian: Исцелите выжившего, находящегося на пороге смерти.
description.schinese: 治疗一个快要死亡的幸存者。
description.spanish: Cura a superviviente casi muerto.

description.english: Kill 15 zombies at once.
description.french: Éliminez 15 zombies en une fois.
description.italian: Uccidi 15 zombi con un colpo solo.
description.japanese: 一度に15体のゾンビを倒す
description.portuguese: Mate 15 zumbis de uma vez.
description.schinese: 一次击杀15个僵尸。
description.spanish: Mata a 15 zombis a la vez.

description.english: Equip at least 4 survivors with uncommon weapons
description.french: Équipez au moins 4 survivants d'armes peu communes.
description.german: Rüste mindestens 4 Überlebende mit ungewöhnlichen Waffen aus.

description.japanese: 4人以上の生存者に珍しい武器を装備する
description.polish: Wyposaż co najmniej 4 ocalałych w niepospolitą broń.
description.portuguese: Equipar ao menos 4 sobreviventes com armas incomuns
description.russian: Снарядите необычным оружием как минимум 4 выживших.
description.schinese: 为至少4名幸存者装配罕见武器
description.spanish: Equipa al menos a 4 supervivientes con armas poco comunes.

description.english: Equip at least 4 survivors with rare weapons
description.french: Équipez au moins 4 survivants d'armes rares.
description.german: Rüste mindestens 4 Überlebende mit seltenen Waffen aus.
description.italian: Assegna delle armi rare ad almeno 4 sopravvissuti
description.japanese: 4人以上の生存者にレア武器を装備する
description.polish: Wyposaż co najmniej 4 ocalałych w rzadką broń.
description.portuguese: Equipar ao menos 4 sobreviventes com armas raras
description.russian: Снарядите редким оружием как минимум 4 выживших.
description.schinese: 为至少4名幸存者装配稀有武器
description.spanish: Equipa al menos a 4 supervivientes con armas raras.

description.english: Equip at least 4 survivors with legendary weapons
description.french: Équipez au moins 4 survivants d'armes légendaires.
description.german: Rüste mindestens 4 Überlebende mit legendären Waffen aus.
description.italian: Assegna delle armi leggendarie ad almeno 4 sopravvissuti
description.japanese: 4人以上の生存者にレジェンダリー武器を装備する
description.polish: Wyposaż co najmniej 4 ocalałych w legendarną broń.
description.portuguese: Equipar ao menos 4 sobreviventes com armas lendárias
description.russian: Снарядите легендарным оружием как минимум 4 выживших.
description.schinese: 为至少4名幸存者装配史诗级武器
description.spanish: Equipa al menos a 4 supervivientes con armas legendarias.

displayName.italian: Non mi serve il tuo aiuto
displayName.japanese: 手助けなんかいらないね

description.english: Survive until night without healing a survivor
description.french: Survivez jusqu'à la nuit sans soigner de survivant.
description.german: Überlebe bis zur Nacht ohne einen Überlebenden zu heilen.
description.italian: Sopravvivi fino alla notte senza guarire un sopravvissuto
description.japanese: 生存者を回復しないで夜まで生き残る
description.polish: Przeżyj do zmroku bez używania leczenia.
description.portuguese: Sobreviver até a noite sem curar um sobrevivente
description.russian: Доживите до ночи, не исцеляя выживших.
description.schinese: 存活至夜幕降临前，没有一位幸存者接受治疗
description.spanish: Sobrevive hasta la noche sin curar a un superviviente.

description.english: Shut down the Factory!
description.french: Faites fermer l'usine !
description.italian: Chiudi la fabbrica!
description.japanese: 工場をシャットダウンする！
description.portuguese: Desativar a fábrica!
description.schinese: 关闭工厂！
description.spanish: ¡Cierra la fábrica!

description.english: Find and loot a secret house
description.french: Trouvez et pillez une maison secrète.
description.german: Finde und dursuche ein geheimes Haus.
description.italian: Trova e saccheggia una casa segreta
description.japanese: 秘密の家を見つけて探索する
description.portuguese: Encontrar e saquear uma casa secreta
description.schinese: 找到秘密之屋，并在里面获得战利品。
description.spanish: Encuentra y saquea una casa secreta.

displayName.japanese: ジャンパー・ジャック

description.schinese: 消灭终极僵尸王：弹跳杰克
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe: Jack "Saltador"

description.english: Defeat the boss: Sam "Slimey" Splitter

displayName.japanese: モンスター・フランク

description.schinese: 消灭终极僵尸王：魔鬼弗兰克

description.english: Accumulate 250 Scrap
description.french: Accumulez 250 morceaux de ferraille.
description.italian: Accumula 250 rottami

description.schinese: 积累250个碎片
description.spanish: Acumula 250 de chatarra.

description.english: Use 200 airstrikes in a run
description.french: Lancez 200 frappes aériennes dans une partie.
description.italian: Esegui 200 attacchi aerei in una partita
description.japanese: 1回のランで200回空爆する
description.polish: Użyj 200 ataków z powietrza w ciągu jednej gry.
description.portuguese: Usar 200 ataques aéreos em uma jornada
description.schinese: 在一轮游戏中发动200次空袭
description.spanish: Usa 200 ataques aéreos en una ronda.

description.english: Hunt down each type of special zombie!
description.french: Éliminez tous les types de zombies spéciaux !
description.italian: Dai la caccia a ogni tipo di zombi speciale!
description.japanese: すべての種類の特殊ゾンビを倒す！
description.portuguese: Caçar cada tipo de zumbi especial!
description.schinese: 消灭每种特级僵尸！
description.spanish: ¡Da caza a cada tipo de zombi especial!

displayName.japanese: ジャイアントスレイヤー

description.english: Kill 15 giant zombies in a run
description.french: Éliminez 15 zombies géants dans une partie.
description.german: Töte 15 riesige Zombies in einer Runde.
description.italian: Uccidi 15 zombi giganti in una partita
description.japanese: 1回のランで巨大ゾンビを15体倒す
description.koreana: 한 세션 안에 거대 좀비 15명 처치하기
description.polish: Zabij 15 gigantycznych zombie w ciągu jednej gry.
description.portuguese: Matar 15 zumbis gigantes em uma jornada
description.schinese: 在一轮游戏中击杀15个巨型僵尸
description.spanish: Mata 15 zombis gigantes en una ronda.

description.english: Unlock and fill all item slots
description.french: Déverrouillez et remplissez tous les emplacements d'objet.
description.german: Schalte alle Slots für Gegenstände frei und fülle sie.
description.italian: Sblocca e riempi tutti gli slot per oggetti
description.japanese: すべてのスロットをアンロックしてアイテムを装備する
description.koreana: 모든 아이템 슬롯 해제 및 채우기
description.polish: Odblokuj i zapełnij wszystkie miejsca na przedmioty.
description.portuguese: Desbloquear e preencher todos os espaços para itens
description.russian: Разблокируйте и заполните все ячейки предметов.
description.schinese: 解锁所有道具槽，并放置道具。
description.spanish: Desbloquea y llena todos los espacios para objetos.

description.english: Win a run with only one survivor living
description.french: Remportez une partie avec un seul survivant restant.
description.german: Gewinne eine runde mit nur einem Überlebendem.
description.italian: Vinci una partita con un solo sopravvissuto vivente
description.japanese: 1回のランを1人の生存者が生き残った状態で勝つ
description.koreana: 생존자 한 명만으로 한 세션 진행하기
description.polish: Wygraj, mając jednego żywego ocalałego w drużynie.
description.portuguese: Vencer uma jornada com apenas um sobrevivente vivo
description.russian: Успешно завершите прохождение с одним живым выжившим.
description.schinese: 取得一轮游戏胜利，只有一位幸存者存活。
description.spanish: Gana una ronda con un único superviviente vivo.

description.english: Win a run without any survivor deaths
description.french: Remportez une partie sans perdre un seul survivant.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne das ein Überlebender stirbt.
description.italian: Vinci una partita senza far morire i sopravvissuti
description.japanese: 1回のランを生存者が誰も死亡しない状態で勝つ
description.koreana: 생존자 사망 없이 한 세션 진행하기
description.polish: Wygraj grę, nie tracąc żadnych ocalałych.
description.portuguese: Vencer uma jornada sem nenhuma morte de sobrevivente
description.russian: Успешно завершите прохождение, не потеряв ни одного выжившего.
description.schinese: 取得一轮游戏胜利，幸存者全员存活。
description.spanish: Gana una ronda sin muertes de supervivientes.

description.english: Win the final wave with only melee weapons equipped
description.french: Remportez la vague finale en n'ayant équipé que des armes de corps à corps.
description.german: Bezwinge die Fabrik nur mit Nahkampfwaffen ausgerüstet.
description.italian: Vinci l'ondata finale utilizzando solo armi da mischia
description.japanese: 最終ウェーブを近接武器のみ装備して勝つ
description.koreana: 근접 무기만 장착하여 최종 웨이브에서 승리하기
description.polish: Pokonaj finałową falę przeciwników, używając tylko broni do walki wręcz.
description.portuguese: Vencer a onda final equipando apenas armas corpo a corpo
description.russian: Победите последнюю волну, используя лишь оружие ближнего боя.
description.schinese: 在最终波中只使用近战获得胜利。
description.spanish: Supera la oleada final solo con armas cuerpo a cuerpo.

description.english: Win a run without upgrading any items or powers
description.french: Remportez une partie sans améliorer de pouvoirs ou d'objets.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde ohne eine Spezialfähigkeit oder Gegenständ zu verbessern
description.italian: Vinci una partita senza potenziare oggetti o poteri
description.japanese: アイテムや能力をアップグレードせずにランに勝つ
description.koreana: 한 세션 안에 아이템 또는 특수 능력을 업그레이드하지 않고 진행하기
description.polish: Wygraj grę, nie ulepszając żadnych przedmiotów ani mocy.
description.portuguese: Vencer uma jornada sem aprimorar nenhum item ou poder
description.russian: Успешно завершите прохождение, не улучшая предметы и силы.
description.schinese: 只使用基础道具和技能取得一轮游戏胜利。
description.spanish: Gana una ronda sin mejorar ningún objeto o poder.

description.english: Win the final day with all equipped items and powers upgraded
description.french: Terminez le dernier jour en vous équipant de tous vos objets et pouvoirs améliorés.
description.german: Bezwinge die Fabrik mit allen ausgersüteten Gegenständen und Spezialfähigkeiten verbessert.
description.italian: Vinci l'ultimo giorno con tutti gli oggetti e i poteri in uso potenziati
description.japanese: 装備したアイテムや能力を全てアップグレードした状態で最終日に勝つ
description.koreana: 장착한 모든 아이템과 특수 능력을 업그레이드한 채 마지막 날 승리하기
description.polish: Wygraj grę, mając przygotowane same ulepszone moce i przedmioty.
description.portuguese: Vencer o dia final com todos os itens equipados e poderes aprimorados
description.russian: Успешно завершите последний день, используя только улучшенные предметы и силы.
description.schinese: 在升级了所有已装备道具和技能的情况下获得一场胜利。
description.spanish: Gana en el último día con todos los objetos y poderes mejorados.

description.english: Complete a specialization

description.italian: Completa una specializzazione

description.portuguese: Concluir uma especialização

description.portuguese: Concluir todas as especializações básicas

description.english: Unlock all entries in the encyclopedia

description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las entradas de la enciclopedia.

description.english: Find a map piece

description.italian: Trova un pezzo di mappa

description.portuguese: Encontrar uma parte do mapa

description.spanish: Encuentra los 4 trozos del mapa.

description.english: Have 40 or more food
description.french: Possédez au moins 40 unités de nourriture.

description.portuguese: Ter 40 ou mais de comida
description.schinese: 获得40个及以上的食物
description.spanish: Ten 40 alimentos o más.

displayName.japanese: ターゲットオーディエンス

description.english: Find and interact with 3 billboards in a run
description.french: Trouvez et interagissez avec 3 panneaux d'affichage dans une partie.
description.german: Finde und untersuche 3 Werbetafeln in einer Runde

description.portuguese: Encontrar e interagir com 3 painéis em uma jornada

description.schinese: 在一轮游戏中找到并搜索3块广告牌

description.english: Reach 10000 points in a daily challenge
description.french: Atteignez 10 000 points dans un défi quotidien.

description.english: Destroy all trees on a mission
description.french: Abattez tous les arbres lors d'une mission.
description.german: Zerstöre alle Bäume auf einer Mission
description.italian: Distruggi tutti gli alberi in una missione
description.japanese: ミッション中にすべての木を破壊する
description.portuguese: Destruir todas as árvores em uma missão
description.schinese: 在单个任务内摧毁所有的树木。
description.spanish: Destruye todos los árboles en una misión.

description.english: Survive until minute 5 during nighttime
description.french: Survivez jusqu'à la 5e minute de la nuit.
description.german: Überlebe bis Minute 5 während einer Nacht
description.italian: Sopravvivi fino al minuto 5 di notte
description.japanese: 夜間にミニッツ5まで生き残る
description.portuguese: Sobreviver até o minuto 5 durante a noite
description.schinese: 在夜晚存活超过5分钟。
description.spanish: Sobrevive hasta el minuto 5 durante la noche.

description.english: Complete a run with only perfect days
description.french: Terminez une partie avec uniquement des journées parfaites.
description.german: Gewinne eine Runde nur mit perfekten Tagen
description.italian: Completa una partita con solo giornate perfette
description.japanese: パーフェクトデーだけでランをクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ grę składającą się z samych doskonałych dni.
description.portuguese: Concluir uma jornada apenas com dias perfeitos
description.russian: Завершите прохождение только из отличных дней.
description.schinese: 只用完美幸存日完成一局游戏
description.spanish: Completa una ronda solo con días perfectos.

description.english: Spend 150 scrap on vending machines
description.french: Dépensez 150 morceaux de ferraille dans des distributeurs.
description.italian: Spendi 150 rottami ai distributori automatici
description.japanese: 自動販売機でスクラップを150個消費する
description.polish: Wydaj 150 kawałków złomu na zakupy w automatach sprzedających.
description.portuguese: Gastar 150 de sucata em máquinas de vendas
description.russian: Потратьте 150 ед. лома в торговых автоматах.
description.schinese: 在自动贩卖机花费150个碎片
description.spanish: Gasta 150 de chatarra en máquinas expendedoras.

description.english: Find all weapons once
description.french: Trouvez toutes les armes une fois.
description.italian: Trova tutte le armi una volta
description.japanese: 全ての武器を1回以上発見する
description.polish: Znajdź każdą broń co najmniej raz.
description.portuguese: Encontrar todas as armas uma vez
description.schinese: 首次获得所有武器
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las armas una vez.

description.english: Have 3 drones equipped at once
description.french: Équipez 3 drones à la fois.
description.italian: Assegna 3 droni contemporaneamente
description.japanese: 1度にドローンを3機装備する
description.polish: Miej 3 aktywne drony w tym samym czasie.
description.portuguese: Ter 3 drones equipados de uma vez
description.schinese: 同时装配3架无人机
description.spanish: Ten 3 drones equipados al mismo tiempo.

description.english: Loot 100 houses in one run
description.french: Pillez 100 maisons dans une partie.
description.italian: Saccheggia 100 case in una partita
description.japanese: 1回のランで家を100件探索する
description.polish: Splądruj 100 domów w trakcie jednej gry.
description.portuguese: Saquear 100 casas em uma jornada
description.schinese: 在一轮游戏中获得100个房屋中的战利品
description.spanish: Saquea 100 casas en una sola ronda.

description.english: Accumulate 30 tools
description.french: Accumulez 30 outils.
description.italian: Accumula 30 attrezzi
description.japanese: ツール30個を収集する
description.portuguese: Acumule 30 ferramentas
description.schinese: 拥有30个工具
description.spanish: Acumula 30 herramientas.

description.english: Upgrade a custom weapon to tier 5
description.french: Améliorez une arme personnalisable jusqu'au rang 5.
description.german: Verbessere eine spezialangefertige Waffe auf Stufe 5
description.italian: Potenzia un'arma personalizzata al rango 5
description.japanese: カスタム武器をランク5までアップグレードする
description.portuguese: Aprimore uma arma personalizada para o grau 5
description.schinese: 将一件定制武器升至第5级
description.spanish: Mejora un arma personalizada a la categoría 5.

description.english: Build all 3 rooms in the base
description.french: Construisez les 3 pièces de votre base.
description.german: Bauen Sie alle 3 Räume in der Basis
description.italian: Costruisci tutte e 3 le sale nella base
description.japanese: 基地に3部屋を建築する
description.portuguese: Construa todas as 3 salas na base
description.schinese: 在基地中建造所有3个房间
description.spanish: Construye las 3 salas de la base.

description.english: Finish the game by building the rocket and flying into space
description.french: Terminez la partie en construisant la fusée et en vous envolant dans l'espace.
description.german: Beende das Spiel, indem du eine Rakete baust und in den Weltall abhaust.
description.italian: Termina la partita costruendo il razzo e volando nello spazio
description.japanese: ロケットを開発して、宇宙へと飛び立ってクリアする
description.koreana: 로켓을 제작해 우주로 날아가 게임 끝내기
description.polish: Ukończ grę, budując rakietę i odlatując w kosmos.
description.portuguese: Concluir o jogo construindo um foguete e voando para o espaço
description.russian: Пройдите игру, построив ракету и улетев в космос.
description.schinese: 通过建造火箭并飞往太空来完成游戏
description.spanish: Construye el cohete para terminar el juego y volar al espacio.
